#id=1
#text=I walked to the bus stop near my home so that I could get to work .
#id=2
#text=I brought along my purse which had my bus card in it so that I could ride without paying cash .
#id=3
#text=It only took a few minutes for the noisy bus to arrive .
#id=4
#text=It stopped at the bus stop and the door opened .
#id=5
#text=The bus driver scanned my bus card and I walked to an empty bench near the middle of the bus .
#id=6
#text=Many other passengers boarded the bus after me and soon the bus was nearly full .
#id=7
#text=Looking around me , I saw a number of senior citizens as well as other young adults .
#id=8
#text=There was even a woman with a sleeping baby sitting on the bus near my bench .
#id=9
#text=I decided to listen to music on my smart phone while I waited for the bus to reach my destination .
#text=The bus stopped every few minutes to let other passengers on and off of the bus .
#text=After about an hour , the bus stopped at my bus stop and I got up and walked out of the bus , wishing the driver a good day .
